description: These premium ELITE heated mitts for women offer up to 8 hours of extra warmth on freezing-cold days, thanks to our adjustable heating technology KOMBI WARM-UP that radiates all over the hands. The stretchiness of the water-resistant FLEXSHELL fabric allows your hands to move freely during any activity. Naturally moisture-wicking and antimicrobial, the wool-blend lining guarantees comfort at all times. The addition of our PRIMALOFT® Gold P.U.R.E.™ recycled, breathable, and water-resistant insulation offers the perfect level of warmth for alpine skiing, even when the heating element is not activated. Plus, the premium goatskin palm with PRIMALOFT® Eco Gold Grip Control makes having a firm grip on your gear a breeze.<br><br>The Blaze women’s mitts rank 4 on our warmth level scale.
name: Blaze Mitts - Womens

specs.value: Fflexshell water-resistant and breathable stretch fabric
Waterguard® waterproof, breathable, and windproof PFC-free membrane
